de.esoco.storage

Class QueryPredicate<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.expression.function.AbstractFunction<T,java.lang.Boolean>
        • de.esoco.lib.expression.predicate.AbstractPredicate<T>
          • de.esoco.storage.QueryPredicate<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Function<T,java.lang.Boolean>, java.util.function.Predicate<T>, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class QueryPredicate<T>
extends de.esoco.lib.expression.predicate.AbstractPredicate<T>
    A predicate that encapsulates the data that is necessary to perform a query on objects in a storage. Although this class is mainly intended to define storage queries it's evaluate() method can also be applied to objects of the queried type if necessary.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.esoco.lib.expression.Predicate
